Readymade Taxi App Development Solution for your Transport Business

Bus, Taxi, Bike or Truck – Transform your business with an automated solution!

Why develop an application from the scratch when you can have your own with our On Demand Taxi application. We offer highly functional features with great UX and UI design and giving you the flexibility to customize the features according to your business idea. Our smarter app development model is perfectly suitable for all businesses looking towards maximizing interaction and enhancing conversion rate.

Cab Booking App Development Solutions for all Devices and Business

Our customizable taxi app is eminent for start-ups to enterprises, providing them with the high-quality and versatile scope to deliver best services to their users.

Taxi Hiring / Independent Service Provider

If you run a small independent taxi service and want to have an online presence, then our Taxi app development solution is for you. Giving best features, our user-friendly app is best suitable for your business providing you with more rides and expanding your services reach.

Business Owner

Looking for starting new on-demand services as a part of your business, then you can opt for a custom-made taxi booking app to start today. Our highly functional app will help you to outshine in the market among your competitors and will enhance your ROI.

Entrepreneur

If you are new to the business domain and looking to have your own carpooling or rental car business, then go for our Taxi booking app services. Our Uber-like taxi app source code is a cost-effective and highly scalable solution to meet up with your business needs.

Talk To Experts

Taxi Rental App Development Services

Corporate Taxi Rentals

Give your professional customers luxurious trips to their work, office trips, etc. For corporate purpose get the best car rental application to offer efficient services to your business customers.
 

Outstation Rental Service

Enhance your travel business by offering outstation car rental services to your customers. We make customers travel journey more excited by offering user-friendly and impressive taxi booking app.
 

On-Demand Car rental Service

Meet the on-demand requests from your customers. We build apps for businesses offering cab facilities on hourly or half-day or full-day basis. Expand your business with an app for renting personal cars to fulfill your customers’ needs.

On-Demand Taxi Booking App Development Features

An all-inclusive range of taxi mobile application development solutions to maximize your business reach.

  • Passenger app
  • Driver App
  • Admin Panel

We make Taxi app that Brings Happiness to Passenger’s Face

We brings impressive application features that are user-friendly and are compatible with iOS and Android platforms. We provide a smooth user interface to excel the user experience.

Features:
  • Real-Time ETA
  • Ride Now
  • Payment Gateways
  • SOS Tab

  • Better ride experience with real-time ETA updates.

  • Book your ride in few clicks and travel to your favourite place.

  • We offer multiple payment methods that are easy and secure.

  • Call at the time of emergency with a single touch.

Reviews and Ratings

Share and rate riding experience to improve the user experience.

User Profile

This section manages the user’s account details including name, email, phone number, etc.


View Full Features

  • Mobile/Email Verification

    A One-time password will be sent to the user’s mobile number and Email ID to verify the user’s detail.


  • Schedule Your Ride

    Schedule a ride for upcoming dates and times and ensure hassle-free ride.


  • Notification Alerts

    Updates about upcoming trip details, driver arriving notification and driver allocation message.


  • Fare Estimation

    Get a prior knowledge of the fare that will be charged after ride completion.


  • Track Driver

    View your cab location with the high-quality tracking system.


  • Share Ride

    Let your beloved ones know where your current location is situated.


  • Promo Codes

    The special offers are available to bring a smile on user’s face.


  • Refer and Earn

    Refer the application to your friends and earn rewards in return.


  • Contact Driver

    Contact your driver for guiding to the pickup location.


  • Cancel Ride

    Plan changed, then cancel ride easily.


  • Call Support

    Refer FAQ and contact support team when you need to resolve any query.


  • Support Friend

    Book rides for friends and shares taxi details through SMS.

Driver App

Our taxi app solutions are easy to use and runs on multiple platforms. We understand that driver may be busy in driving thus, brings single-touch application interface for friendly handling.

Features:
  • Register Now
  • Real Time Requests
  • Trip Details
  • Payment Tracking

  • A New driver can register on the app with few simple steps and can request to be part of your service provider.

  • Drivers gets a notification for the new ride and a simple interface to accept or decline the request.

  • Drivers get customer’s information and pickup location.

  • Daily and monthly earnings, track the pending payments and performance insights.

Accept/Reject a Request

Driver needs to accept a ride in order to start the ride. The driver can reject request according to his flexibility.

Availability Tab

Driver can show his presence by going online or can stay offline if not available.


View Full Features

  • Notifications

    Drivers are notified of the new ride request with pick up location details.


  • Easy Navigation

    Guiding driver through the best route with the built-in navigation system with Google maps.


  • Contact Passenger

    Call passenger to ask details of their pick-up location.


  • Start and End Ride

    Start and end a ride with a single touch and get an auto generated bill.


  • Driver Dashboard

    Get performance and trip details on the dashboard.


  • Rate Customer

    Rate riders on the basis of their behavior.


  • Track Past Bookings

    The driver can track his past record and can see his performance over the time.

Admin Panel

You as a service provider has a full control over maintaining different aspects of the applications like customers, drivers, and transactions.

Features:
  • Manage Drivers
  • Manage Customers
  • Report Analysis
  • Refunds

  • Add new drivers, set rates and review signup requests.

    Dashboard

    Overview panel of all operations and performance.
     

    Secure Login

    Login to the admin panel from any browser with high access security.

  • Manage customer’s details to reach them at time of promotional ads or schemes.

    Dashboard

    Overview panel of all operations and performance.
     

    Secure Login

    Login to the admin panel from any browser with high access security.

  • Get a complete report about the app performance and take better decision to improvise the app features.

    Dashboard

    Overview panel of all operations and performance.
     

    Secure Login

    Login to the admin panel from any browser with high access security.

  • Manage refunds initiated to the passengers and maintain customer relationship.

    Dashboard

    Overview panel of all operations and performance.
     

    Secure Login

    Login to the admin panel from any browser with high access security.


View Full Features

  • Allocate Drivers

    Allocate drivers the rides based on their current location.


  • Manual Bookings

    Admin has the authority to book rides manually for phone calls requests.


  • Language and Currency Setting

    Set country, type of currency and language depending on the demography.


  • Schedule Rides Settings

    Configure the bookings and allocate drivers according to the driver’s availability.
